import { faPencilAlt, faTrash } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; const ProductComponent = ({ products, Agregar }) => { return (
# Product Category Description Quantity Unit Price Picture Edit Delete
{products.id_product} {products.name} {products.category} {products.description} {products.quantity} {products.unitPrice}
) } export default ProductComponent;
